front.title: Pub-Sub Profile for Authentication and Authorization for Constrained Environments (ACE)

abstract.t: This specification defines an application profile for authentication and authorization for Publishers and Subscribers in a constrained pub-sub scenario, using the ACE framework. This profile relies on transport layer or application layer security to authorize the pub- sub clients to the broker. Moreover, it describes the use of application layer security to protect the content of the pub-sub client message exchange through the broker. The profile mainly focuses on the pub-sub scenarios using the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) [I-D.ietf-core-coap-pubsub].
